document_data.name: Amath Sercent
document_data.mainbody: '''Amath Sercent''' ({{Pronounce|AH|math|_|SER|sent|refs=}}) was a priestess of [[Bane]] in [[Waterdeep]] during the early 1490s [[DR]].
document_data.Activities: Amath went to pray to her god with her acolytes in an abandoned tower in the [[Castle Ward of Waterdeep|Castle Ward]] that she was converting to a temple to Bane. Amath worked in [[Manshoon]]'s takeover of the city by trying to gain control of the broadsheet publishers of Waterdeep.
document_data.History:
In [[1492 DR]],{{WDH-time}} Amath was busy with her project to forcibly convert publishers to Bane's worship and her target was [[Shan Chien]].

If [[Manshoon]] managed to obtain the ''[[Stone of Golorr]]'', thanks to the actions of her companion [[Agorn Fuoco]], Amath was ordered to protect the Stone. She kept custody of the Stone while waiting for the arrival of Manshoon.
document_data.Relationship: Amath was an ally of Manshoon's [[Zhentarim]].
